name: @accumulators/hashers
description: A TypeScript implementation of multiple hashing functions
author: Herodotus Dev Ltd

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p lib/pedersen && ls src && ls src/pedersen && cp src/pedersen/{pedersen_wasm_bg.wasm,pedersen_wasm_bg.wasm.d.ts,pedersen_wasm.js,pedersen_wasm.d.ts} lib/pedersen
